item.title: New Container: pyLoad-ng
item.description: We have released a new container for pyLoad-ng! pyLoad-ng is a Free and Open Source download manager written in Python and designed to be extremely lightweight, easily extensible and fully manageable via web.
item.content:
We have released a new container for pyLoad-ng!

pyLoad-ng is a Free and Open Source download manager written in Python and designed to be extremely lightweight, easily extensible and fully manageable via web.
